languages.text: Залитый воском интерпретатор безмолвствует. Установленная на него новая толстая свеча и молитва Омниссии об очищении ходовых частей определенно помогут.

traits.locale_text: Воск залился в крепления переборки и вы не понимаете как ее снять. Остается надеяться, что, убрав излишки, машине стало легче.

languages.text: The wax-stained interpreter is silent. Having had a new thick candle set on top and a prayer offered to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears, you feel confident that the machine will start working again in no time.
languages.original_text: Залитый воском интерпретатор безмолвствует. Установленная на него новая толстая свеча и молитва Омниссии об очищении ходовых частей определенно помогут.

traits.locale_text: The wax-stained interpreter is silent. The new thick candle set on top of it and a prayer to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears are certainly going to help.
The wax-stained interpreter is silent. The new thick candle set on top of it and a prayer to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears are certainly going to help.
The wax-stained interpreter is silent. It would certainly help to have a new thick candle set on top and a prayer to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears.
The wax-stained interpreter is silent. It would certainly help to have a new thick candle set on top and a prayer to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears.

The wax-stained interpreter is silent. Having had a new thick candle set on top and a prayer offered to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears, you feel confident that the machine will start working again in no time.

The wax-stained interpreter is silent. Having had a new thick candle set on top and a prayer offered to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears, you feel confident that the machine will start working again in no time.

languages.text: El intérprete manchado de cera guarda silencio. Ahora que se le ha colocado una gruesa vela y se ha ofrecido una plegaria al Omnissiah para purificar los engranajes, no te cabe duda de que pronto volverá a funcionar.
languages.original_text: The wax-stained interpreter is silent. Having had a new thick candle set on top and a prayer offered to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears, you feel confident that the machine will start working again in no time.

traits.locale_text: El intérprete manchado de cera guarda silencio. Ahora que se le ha colocado una gruesa vela y se ha ofrecido una plegaria al Omnissiah para purificar los engranajes, no te cabe duda de que pronto volverá a funcionar.

languages.text: 蝋で汚れたインタープリターは沈黙している。新しく厚いロウソクを上に置き、万機神に祈りを捧げて稼働するギアを浄化した。これなら、マシンはすぐに再び動き始めるだろう。
languages.original_text: The wax-stained interpreter is silent. Having had a new thick candle set on top and a prayer offered to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears, you feel confident that the machine will start working again in no time.

traits.locale_text: 蝋で汚れたインタープリターは沈黙している。新しく厚いロウソクを上に置き、万機神に祈りを捧げて稼働するギアを浄化した。これなら、マシンはすぐに再び動き始めるだろう。

languages.text: 沾满蜡油的阐释器没有发出任何声音。你在阐释器顶部放了一根新的粗蜡烛，同时向欧姆尼塞亚祈祷，愿齿轮能得到净化。做完这些之后，你感觉信心满满，机器应该很快就会重新开始工作了。
languages.original_text: The wax-stained interpreter is silent. Having had a new thick candle set on top and a prayer offered to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears, you feel confident that the machine will start working again in no time.

traits.locale_text: 沾满蜡油的阐释器没有发出任何声音。你在阐释器顶部放了一根新的粗蜡烛，同时向欧姆尼塞亚祈祷，愿齿轮能得到净化。做完这些之后，你感觉信心满满，机器应该很快就会重新开始工作了。

languages.text: Der wachsbefleckte Dolmetscher ist stummt. Eine dicke, neue Kerze wurde auf die Maschine gestellt und es wurde zum Omnissiah gebetet, ihre Zahnräder zu reinigen. Du bist überzeugt, dass die Maschine schon bald wieder einwandfrei funktionieren wird.
languages.original_text: The wax-stained interpreter is silent. Having had a new thick candle set on top and a prayer offered to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears, you feel confident that the machine will start working again in no time.

traits.locale_text: Der wachsbefleckte Dolmetscher ist stummt. Eine dicke, neue Kerze wurde auf die Maschine gestellt und es wurde zum Omnissiah gebetet, ihre Zahnräder zu reinigen. Du bist überzeugt, dass die Maschine schon bald wieder einwandfrei funktionieren wird.

languages.text: L'interprète taché de cire reste silencieux. Maintenant qu'une nouvelle bougie a été placée au sommet et qu'une prière de purification des rouages a été adressée à l'Omnimessie, vous êtes {mf|certain|certaine} que la machine devrait de nouveau fonctionner correctement sous peu.
languages.original_text: The wax-stained interpreter is silent. Having had a new thick candle set on top and a prayer offered to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears, you feel confident that the machine will start working again in no time.

traits.locale_text: L'interprète taché de cire reste silencieux. Maintenant qu'une nouvelle bougie a été placée au sommet et qu'une prière de purification des rouages a été adressée à l'Omnimessie, vous êtes {mf|certain|certaine} que la machine devrait de nouveau fonctionner correctement sous peu.

languages.text: Bal mumuyla lekelenmiş yorumlayıcıdan ses çıkmıyor. Üzerine yepyeni kalınca mumlar yerleştirip çalışan dişlilerin arınması için Hermesih'e dua ettikten sonra makinenin zaman kaybetmeden tekrar çalışmaya başlayacağından eminsin.
languages.original_text: The wax-stained interpreter is silent. Having had a new thick candle set on top and a prayer offered to the Omnissiah for the cleansing of the running gears, you feel confident that the machine will start working again in no time.
